main.name: Tony Kung
main.description: I like to create things and solve problems by writing code.
main.bio: I spent my early career in finance and have an MBA. Now I turn my passion into coding. I like to develop great apps to make people's life easier.

education.description: Hack Reactor is an immersive 12 week coding boot camp (800+ hours) that teaches a JavaScript-focused curriculum (ReactJS, MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, Node, etc.)

projects.title: Twittler
projects.description: A Twitter inspired short conversation feed platform allowing users to load new tweets and display them from different users  by clicking on usernames

projects.title: Good News
projects.description: Single page web application to filter for positive news utilizing the New York Times and IBM Watson APIs.

projects.title: Event Pulse
projects.description: Executed and contributed full-stack web development project in Agile setting, with an emphasis on front-end features, browser manipulation, and responsive design

testimonials.text: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
